title: JSON schema for Team Essentials settings

defaults.description: Set any defaults your team needs set on the `.vscode/settings.json` file in here.

explorer.filters.description: Set any file exclusion, within a named group here.

extensions.required.description: List of extensions requirements. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'msjsdiag.debugger-for-edge'.
